article.title: Alliant to Provide Missile Warning Systems Components
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Alliant Techsystems Incorporated, Clearwater, Florida, is being awarded a contract valued at more than $66 million to procure up to 4,600 various AN/AAR-47 missile warning system weapons replaceable assemblies, including new or upgraded optical sensor converters, computer processors and control panels, and associated repairs necessary to return upgrade units to ready for issue condition.Â These systems are for installation on U.S. Navy, U.S. Marine Corps, U.S. Air Force, other services, and various foreign military helicopters, rotorcraft, and low/slow fixed wing aircraft. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
